name: Lasertag Legends
summary:
Lasertag Legends is a multiplayer lasertag game.

The action takes place in a colorful, neon lit lasertag arena sometime in the near future.

Choose a team, get in the arena and start fragging! 

Each frag helps push your team up the league table. 

At the end of the season, one team will be crowned champions of the Royal Lasertag League.

Lasertag Legends features 3 main modes:

Multiplayer Modes:
The Main Stage: Battle it out against other players in the Lasertag Legends Arena 

The Cube: Practice...
